io.netty.handler.codec.spdy

Class SpdyFrameCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
        • io.netty.channel.ChannelDuplexHandler
          • io.netty.channel.CombinedChannelDuplexHandler<SpdyFrameDecoder,SpdyFrameEncoder>
            • io.netty.handler.codec.spdy.SpdyFrameCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChannelHandler, ChannelInboundHandler, ChannelOutboundHandler

    public final class SpdyFrameCodec
extends CombinedChannelDuplexHandler<SpdyFrameDecoder,SpdyFrameEncoder>
    A combination of SpdyFrameDecoder and SpdyFrameEncoder.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler

        ChannelHandler.Sharable

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpdyFrameCodec(SpdyVersion version)
      Creates a new instance with the specified version and the default decoder and encoder options (maxChunkSize (8192), maxHeaderSize (16384), compressionLevel (6), windowBits (15), and memLevel (8)).
      SpdyFrameCodec(SpdyVersion version, int maxChunkSize, int maxHeaderSize, int compressionLevel, int windowBits, int memLevel)
      Creates a new instance with the specified decoder and encoder options.
